segments.text: I'd like to apply for a credit card . Can you help me with my application ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid that I don't have a credit history . I just came to this country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have an account with this bank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case I highly recommend you apply for a savings and checking account also . That would help with your credit card application .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the interest rate on your card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . The credit card is a revolving account . You only pay interest on what you owe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How does the bank bill its customers for credit card charges ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will receive a monthly statement with each expenditure itemized .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the card provide any other benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can also get a cash advance up to 1,000 dollars on this card .
segments.speaker: S2
